about_the_game:
The world is under attack by a ruthless artificial intelligence with a base on the Moon.

In Tankmageddon, a roguelike tank game, you play as Ed, a tank pilot and mechanic fighting to dismantle and steal enemy technology in order to put an end to this looming threat. Battle through diverse environments, facing increasingly powerful enemies as you approach the heart of the invasion. Use the parts from defeated machines to strengthen your own tank and destroy them with their own weapons.

In the midst of the chaos, humanity is struggling to survive. You'll receive help from the resistance, encounter bandit camps, and collaborate with various inhabitants of the world, all of whom are willing to offer their assistance—for a price.

Tankmageddon is still in early development, but we aim to bring you a game with:

  • Dozens of upgrades and weapons for your tank.

  • Numerous enemies with unique abilities that you can acquire.

  • A strategic map where you choose your battles.

  • A variety of bosses with unique mechanics and behaviors.

  • At least 6 distinct environments that will redefine the way you approach combat.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5257U, AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050, AMD RX 460 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Tankmageddon is a fast-paced roguelike tank game where you play as Ed, a pilot and mechanic on an Earth facing invasion. A ruthless A.I. has built a tank factory on the Moon and plans to wipe out humanity. Face hordes of enemy machines and use their parts to defeat them.

English*, Spanish - Latin America
